name: Snapshot (itch) (jbisnar)
description:
Snapshot is a puzzle platformer where you take still images of moving platforms and then play through  the images.

Controls:

Space: Switch between Photo mode and View mode

In Photo mode:

- M1: Take photo

- R: Clear photos

In View mode:

- W: Jump / Walljump

- ASD: Move

- M1: Next photo

- R: Go back to 1st photo

*If you are stuck in Photo mode and cannot take pictures, try pressing space
